titles.ar: باب الْمَرْأَةِ تَرَى الدَّمَ وَ هِيَ جُنُبٌ
titles.en: Chapter 8 – The woman sees the blood and she is with sexual impurity

titles.ar: باب جَامِعٌ فِي الْحَائِضِ وَ الْمُسْتَحَاضَةِ
titles.en: Chapter 9 – The comprehensive regarding the menstruation (Haydh) and the inter-period bleeding (Istihaaza)

titles.ar: باب غُسْلِ الْحَائِضِ وَ مَا يُجْزِئُهَا مِنَ الْمَاءِ
titles.en: Chapter 7 – The washing of the menstruating woman, and what would suffice her from the water

titles.ar: باب الْمَرْأَةِ تَرَى الدَّمَ وَ هِيَ جُنُبٌ
titles.en: Chapter 8 – The woman sees the blood and she is with sexual impurity

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: حسن - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (3/216)

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ الْحَكَمِ عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ يَحْيَى الْكَاهِلِيِّ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: سَأَلْتُهُ عَنِ الْمَرْأَةِ يُجَامِعُهَا زَوْجُهَا فَتَحِيضُ وَ هِيَ فِي الْمُغْتَسَلِ تَغْتَسِلُ أَوْ لَا تَغْتَسِلُ قَالَ قَدْ جَاءَهَا مَا يُفْسِدُ الصَّلَاةَ فَلَا تَغْتَسِلُ.

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Ali Bin Al Hakam, from Abdullah Bin Yahya Al Kahily,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullahasws, said, ‘I asked himasws about the woman who copulates with her husband, and (then) she menstruates while she is in the bathroom. Should she wash or not wash?’ Heasws said: ‘There has come to her what spoils her Salaat, so she does not (need to) wash (for the Salaat)’.
en.sarwar: 1. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad from Ali ibn al-Hakam from ‘Abd Allah ibn Yahya al-Kahiliy who has said the following: “I once asked abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, about a woman who after sexual relation with her husband experiences Hayd (menses) and she is already in the bath area. Must she take Ghusl (bath) or not? He (the Imam) said, ‘Something which invalidates Salah (prayer) has come with her. She does not need Ghusl (bath).’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: صحيح - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (3/216)

narrator_chain.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ يُونُسَ عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ سِنَانٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: سَأَلْتُهُ عَنِ الْمَرْأَةِ تَحِيضُ وَ هِيَ جُنُبٌ هَلْ عَلَيْهَا غُسْلُ الْجَنَابَةِ قَالَ غُسْلُ الْجَنَابَةِ وَ الْحَيْضِ وَاحِدٌ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from Muhammad Bin Isa, from Yunus, from Abdullah Bin Sinan,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullahasws, said, ‘I asked himasws about the woman who menstruates and she is with sexual impurity. Is there a major ablution (from sexual impurity) upon her?’ Heasws said: ‘The major ablution (for sexual impurity) and (for) the menstruation (Haydh), is one’.
en.sarwar: 2. Ali ibn Ibrahim has narrated from Muhammad ibn ‘Isa from Yunus from ‘Abd Allah ibn Sinan who has said the following: “I once asked abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, about a woman who experiences Hayd (menses) when she has had sexual relation if she needed Ghusl (bath) because of sexual relation. He (the Imam) said, ‘Ghusl (bath) for Hayd (menses) and sexual relation is one.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: مجهول - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (13/217)

narrator_chain.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنْ إِسْمَاعِيلَ بْنِ مَرَّارٍ عَنْ يُونُسَ عَنْ سَعِيدِ بْنِ يَسَارٍ قَالَ

text: قُلْتُ لِأَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) الْمَرْأَةُ تَرَى الدَّمَ وَ هِيَ جُنُبٌ أَ تَغْتَسِلُ مِنَ الْجَنَابَةِ أَمْ غُسْلُ الْجَنَابَةِ وَ الْحَيْضِ فَقَالَ قَدْ أَتَاهَا مَا هُوَ أَعْظَمُ مِنْ ذَلِكَ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ismail Bin Marrar, from Yunus, from Saeed Bin Yasaar who said,

‘I said to Abu Abdullahasws, ‘The woman sees the blood and she is with sexual impurity. Should she wash from the sexual impurity or wash from the sexual impurity and the menstruation (Haydh)?’ So heasws said: ‘There has come to her what is greater than that’.
en.sarwar: 3. Ali ibn Ibrahim has narrated from his father from ’Isma‘il ibn Marrar from Yunus from Sa‘id ibn Yasar who has said the following: “I once asked abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, about the case of a woman who experiences blood discharge because of Hayd (menses) when she has had sexual relation if she needs Ghusl (bath) because of sexual relation or Ghusl (bath) because of the sexual relation and Hayd (menses). He (the Imam) said, ‘She has experienced something bigger than that (sexual relation).”
